Class BaseView

java.lang.Object
view.BaseView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyRepresentativeView, StaffView, StudentView
public abstract class BaseView extends Object
Base class for all views - concise implementation.

    • showDataLoop

      protected <T> void showDataLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> dataSupplier, BiFunction<Supplier<List<?>>, String, Boolean> displayFunction, Runnable filterHandler)
      Generic data display loop that automatically refreshes after actions. Core reusable method - all specific loops delegate to this. The displayFunction should handle pagination and user interactions internally, only returning when user explicitly exits (false) or requests filter menu (true). Return value semantics from displayFunction: - false: User pressed 'B' (back) - exit loop completely - true: User pressed 'F' (filter) - show filter menu then refresh data Actions within the table are handled by re-fetching data internally in displayFunction.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type marker for data (internship or application)
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      dataSupplier - Supplier function to get fresh data
      displayFunction - Function that takes (dataSupplier, header) and returns exit code
      filterHandler - Optional handler for filter menu (null if no filtering)

    • showInternshipsLoop

      protected void showInternshipsLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> getInternships, String emptyMsg, FilterSettings filterSettings, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, boolean showStatus)
      Displays internships in a loop with filtering capability (with status column).
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      getInternships - Supplier function to get internships
      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details
      onAction - Action callback for single action
      actionPrompt - Prompt for the action
      showStatus - Whether to show status column

    • showInternshipsLoop

      protected void showInternshipsLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> getInternships, String emptyMsg, FilterSettings filterSettings, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, boolean showStatus, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts)
      Displays internships in a loop with filtering and multiple actions capability. Uses generic showDataLoop for automatic refresh.
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      getInternships - Supplier function to get internships
      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details
      onAction - Action callback for single action (can be null)
      actionPrompt - Prompt for the action (can be null)
      showStatus - Whether to show status column
      actions - Map of action codes to callbacks (can be null)
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to prompts (can be null)

    • displayPaginatedInternshipTableWithRefresh

      protected boolean displayPaginatedInternshipTableWithRefresh(Supplier<List<?>> dataSupplier, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts, boolean showStatus)
      Displays paginated internship table with auto-refresh after actions. Uses internal loop to re-fetch data after each action execution.
      Parameters:
      dataSupplier - Supplier to get fresh internship data
      header - The table header
      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      onAction - Action callback for single action (can be null)
      actionPrompt - Prompt for the action (can be null)
      actions - Map of action codes to callbacks (can be null)
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to prompts (can be null)
      showStatus - Whether to show status column
      Returns:
      false if user exits, true if user requests filter menu

    • showInternshipsLoop

      protected void showInternshipsLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> getInternships, String emptyMsg, FilterSettings filterSettings, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt)

      Parameters:

      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found

      detailGetter - Function to get internship details

      protected void showApplicationsLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> getApplications, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter)

      header - The table header
      getApplications - Supplier function to get applications

      detailGetter - Function to get application details

    • showApplicationsLoop

      protected void showApplicationsLoop(String header, Supplier<List<?>> getApplications, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts)
      Displays applications in a loop with multiple actions and automatic refresh.
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      getApplications - Supplier function to get applications
      emptyMsg - Message when no applications found
      detailGetter - Function to get application details
      actions - Map of action codes to callbacks (can be null)
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to prompts (can be null)

    • handleApproveRejectPattern

      protected boolean handleApproveRejectPattern(String header, String emptyMsg, String prompt, Supplier<List<String>> itemsSupplier, Function<Integer,String> idExtractor, BiConsumer<String,Boolean> approvalAction)
      Handles approve/reject workflow with string IDs.
      Parameters:
      header - The header text
      emptyMsg - Message when no items found
      prompt - Selection prompt
      itemsSupplier - Supplier function for items
      idExtractor - Function to extract ID from item
      approvalAction - Action to execute with ID and approval decision
      Returns:
      true if action was taken, false if cancelled

    • handleApproveRejectPatternInt

      protected boolean handleApproveRejectPatternInt(String header, String emptyMsg, String prompt, Supplier<List<String>> itemsSupplier, BiConsumer<Integer,Boolean> approvalAction)

      approvalAction - Action to execute with ID and approval decision

      Checks if edit operation was cancelled.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • collectFieldValues

      protected String[] collectFieldValues(int[] indices, String[] prompts, Function<Integer,Boolean> isIntField)
      Collects new values for selected fields from user input.
      Parameters:
      indices - Array of field indices to collect
      prompts - Array of prompts for each field
      isIntField - Function to determine if field is integer type
      Returns:
      Array of collected field values (null for unselected fields)

    • handleViewProfile

      protected void handleViewProfile()
      Handles viewing the user's profile. Displays profile information and waits for user to continue.

    • handleFilterInternships

      protected void handleFilterInternships(FilterSettings filterSettings, Supplier<List<?>> getAllInternships)
      Displays the filter menu for internships. Reusable method across all views that have filter functionality.
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - The filter settings object to use
      getAllInternships - Supplier to get all internships list

    • handleEditProfile

      protected void handleEditProfile()
      Handles editing the user's profile. Displays current profile and prompts for field edits.

    • getProfileText

      protected String getProfileText()
      Gets the formatted profile text for the current user. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide user-specific profile information.
      Returns:
      formatted profile text

    • editProfileFields

      protected void editProfileFields()
      Handles editing of profile fields. Must be implemented by subclasses to handle user-specific field editing.

    • displayPaginatedInternshipTable

      protected boolean displayPaginatedInternshipTable(String header, List<?> internships, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt)
      Displays a paginated internship table (without status column).
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      internships - List of internships to display
      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      onAction - Action callback for single action
      actionPrompt - Prompt for the action
      Returns:
      true if filter requested, false otherwise

    • displayPaginatedInternshipTable

      protected boolean displayPaginatedInternshipTable(String header, List<?> internships, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, FilterSettings filterSettings, Consumer<Integer> onAction, String actionPrompt, boolean showStatus)
      Displays a paginated internship table with optional status column.
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      internships - List of internships to display
      emptyMsg - Message when no internships found
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      onAction - Action callback for single action
      actionPrompt - Prompt for the action
      showStatus - Whether to show status column
      Returns:
      true if filter requested, false otherwise

    • displayPaginatedApplicationTable

      protected boolean displayPaginatedApplicationTable(String header, List<?> applications, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter)
      Displays a paginated application table.
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      applications - List of applications to display
      emptyMsg - Message when no applications found
      detailGetter - Function to get application details
      Returns:
      true if user wants to go back, false to continue

    • displayPaginatedApplicationTable

      protected boolean displayPaginatedApplicationTable(String header, List<?> applications, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts)
      Displays a paginated application table with multiple actions.
      Parameters:
      header - The table header
      applications - List of applications to display
      emptyMsg - Message when no applications found
      detailGetter - Function to get application details
      actions - Map of action codes to callbacks
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to prompts
      Returns:
      true if user wants to go back, false to continue

    • displayPaginatedApplicationTableWithRefresh

      protected boolean displayPaginatedApplicationTableWithRefresh(Supplier<List<?>> dataSupplier, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts)
      Displays paginated application table with auto-refresh after actions. Uses internal loop to re-fetch data after each action execution.
      Parameters:
      dataSupplier - Supplier to get fresh application data
      header - The table header
      emptyMsg - Message when no applications found
      detailGetter - Function to get application details
      actions - Map of action codes to callbacks
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to prompts
      Returns:
      false (always returns false since applications don't support filtering)
